effect.short: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks the target with a bursting flame.
The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the
target as well.
